texts.biography: Talok was once an elven wizard and had a love affair with Tapio, who played a major role in rescuing captured elves. After this incident, Talok also decided to join the army of the Wikd Valley and live in seclusion with his lovers.
texts.name: Taloc

specialty.description: Casts Magic Arrow with increased effect, based on hero level compared to the level of the target unit (the bonus is greater the lower the target's level).
specialty.name: Magic Arrow
